body_html:
@emitch, thank you for the report.

This is my output on 0.4.0:

CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED at 512 129
CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED at 1024 49
CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED at 2048 13
CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED at 4096 1

I've also gotten the following by running the code in ipython.

THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu line=58 error=77 : an illegal memory access was encountered
cuda runtime error (77) : an illegal memory access was encountered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58 at 512 1
cuda runtime error (77) : an illegal memory access was encountered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58 at 1024 1
cuda runtime error (77) : an illegal memory access was encountered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58 at 2048 1
cuda runtime error (77) : an illegal memory access was encountered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58 at 4096 1

It sounds like a bug to me (maybe we're missing memory checks somewhere?).

body:
@emitch, thank you for the report.

This is my output on 0.4.0:

```
CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED at 512 129
CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED at 1024 49
CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED at 2048 13
CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED at 4096 1
```

I've also gotten the following by running the code in ipython.
```
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu line=58 error=77 : an illegal memory access was encountered
cuda runtime error (77) : an illegal memory access was encountered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58 at 512 1
cuda runtime error (77) : an illegal memory access was encountered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58 at 1024 1
cuda runtime error (77) : an illegal memory access was encountered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58 at 2048 1
cuda runtime error (77) : an illegal memory access was encountered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1524577177097/work/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58 at 4096 1
```

It sounds like a bug to me (maybe we're missing memory checks somewhere?).
